title: Sets limited definition of "living with others" in regard to eligibility for additional supplemental security payments, thus making more persons eligible; repealer
summary: Continues eligibility for additional state payments to those recipients of supplemental security income notwithstanding the fact that they may discontinue living alone; defines "living with others" for these purposes; present law reduces such benefits if such a recipient lives with others.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to eligibility for additional state payments to recipients of supplemental security income benefits and repealing paragraph (b) of subdivision 2 of section 209 of such law relating thereto
